title: Implement "stroke-align:outset" - single and multiple outside strokes for text
body: We need outside strokes for text, because the current centered strokes are not pretty - the intrude the font fill.

comments.body: Supporting "stroke-align:outset" only for non-transparent colors (at first) would be fine with me.
typo: I meant to write "they intrude the font fill"
It's being specified at https://www.w3.org/TR/fill-stroke-3/#propdef-stroke-align .
